title: Toxic Riso
description: Ce style évoque une impression risograph granuleuse aux couleurs néon explosives et aux textures de papier vieilli. Il combine l'énergie du manga rétro avec des défauts d'impression lo-fi pour un rendu urbain et chaotique.
prompt: A high-energy vintage risograph print illustration of {{subject}}. The aesthetic is defined by a gritty, lo-fi screen printing technique featuring heavy grain, noise, and visible paper texture. The color palette is restricted yet vibrant, dominated by {{primary_color}} with electric flashes of {{accent_color}} and hot magenta to create a toxic, high-contrast look. The rendering mimics retro manga covers or underground comic art, with rough ink bleeds, misaligned registration, and bold halftone patterns. The composition feels raw and chaotic, utilizing flat shading and jagged outlines to emphasize a rebellious, urban mood.

title: Textured Whimsy
description: Ce style imite les techniques traditionnelles comme le crayon de couleur et la gouache sèche avec une texture granuleuse marquée. L'esthétique est plate, naïve et chaleureuse, rappelant les illustrations modernes et ludiques des livres pour enfants.
prompt: A charming, hand-drawn illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a mixed-media style imitating colored pencils, wax crayons, and dry gouache. The image features a heavy, grainy texture with visible paper tooth and rough, dry brush strokes. The composition is flat with a naive, 2D perspective and simplified geometric shapes. The color palette is warm and earthy, dominated by {{primary_color}} hues with vibrant {{accent_color}} details. The atmosphere is cozy, creative, and playful, evocative of indie children's picture books, textured illustration, naive art, flat design, dry brush, grainy, whimsical, hand-drawn style, matte finish.

title: Doodle Pop
description: Ce style combine des illustrations de type gribouillage à l'encre noire avec des aplats de couleurs vives et limitées sur un fond crème. Il se distingue par l'utilisation de motifs rayés, de formes géométriques abstraites et d'éléments graphiques ludiques comme des traits d'action.
prompt: A playful, hand-drawn doodle illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a bold ink sketch style with thick, expressive black outlines. The composition uses a strict, limited color palette featuring broad flat fills of {{primary_color}} and small pops of {{accent_color}}, set against a clean, soft cream or off-white background. The aesthetic is characterized by high-contrast graphic elements, including heavy diagonal stripe patterns, geometric shapes, and whimsical floating details like squiggles, dots, and comic-style action lines surrounding the subject. The rendering is flat and vector-like, mimicking a modern corporate creative sketch with a spontaneous, energetic vibe. No shading, high contrast, clean linework, minimalist composition, 2D vector art, ink illustration, creative motif.

title: Modern Vector
description: Ce style se caractérise par une illustration vectorielle plate aux couleurs vives et aux formes géométriques épurées. Il privilégie les aplats de couleurs saturées, l'absence de contours et un ombrage minimaliste pour une esthétique moderne et professionnelle.
prompt: A high-quality flat vector illustration of {{subject}}, designed in a trendy modern corporate art style reminiscent of tech startup branding. The visual aesthetic is defined by bold geometric shapes, exaggerated yet pleasing proportions, and razor-sharp edges with absolutely no outlines. The lighting is uniform and flat, utilizing only hard-edged, solid-colored shadows to create depth without gradients or texture noise. The color palette is vivid and highly saturated, featuring a dominant {{primary_color}} tone that contrasts cleanly with the subject, while distinct {{accent_color}} elements provide visual pop and energy. The composition is clean and centered, conveying a mood of approachability and professionalism. The rendering is perfectly smooth, digital, and crisp.

title: Linear Elegance
description: Ce style minimaliste se distingue par un dessin au trait continu fluide sur un fond de papier texturé blanc cassé. L'œuvre capture l'essence du sujet avec une simplicité sophistiquée, rehaussée par de subtiles touches d'aquarelle pastel.
prompt: A sophisticated continuous line drawing depicting {{subject}}, created with a single, fluid black ink stroke that defines the form without lifting the pen. The style emphasizes negative space, organic curves, and elegant simplicity. The background is a high-quality, textured off-white paper with visible grain. Incorporate a soft, artistic splash of {{primary_color}} watercolor wash to suggest volume, paired with a faint hint of {{accent_color}} for delicate emphasis. The rendering is ultra-minimalist, flat, and clean, combining vector precision with analog warmth. Lighting is even and flat to highlight the line work, minimal, vector style, clean lines, high contrast, fine art, ink illustration, 2d, simple, abstract.
